findings.title: Missing criticalValidation in Tier2Payload type
findings.issue: Tier2Payload interface does not include criticalValidation field, reducing TypeScript safety
findings.suggestion: Add criticalValidation to Tier2Payload type definition
findings.impact: Code works due to JS dynamic nature but TypeScript won't catch type errors

findings.title: Negation word 60-char lookback window boundary
findings.issue: Fixed 60-char lookback window may miss negation words on very long lines
findings.suggestion: Document the limit or consider expanding to 100 chars
findings.impact: Rare edge case for very long lines with distant negation words
